00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "DomainUtil.hpp"
00035 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"

00041 
00042 void bounding_box( const MsqVertex* coords,
00043                    size_t num_coords,
00044                    Vector3D& min,
00045                    Vector3D& max )
00046 {
00047   min = max = coords[0];
00048   for (size_t i = 1; i < num_coords; ++i) {
00049     for (int j = 0; j < 3; ++j) {
00050       if (coords[i][j] < min[j])
00051         min[j] = coords[i][j];
00052       if (coords[i][j] > max[j])
00053         max[j] = coords[i][j];
00054     }
00055   }
00056 }
00057 
00058 double max_box_extent( const MsqVertex* vertex_array, size_t num_vertices )
00059 {
00060   Vector3D min, max;
00061   bounding_box( vertex_array, num_vertices, min, max );
00062   max -= min;
00063   return (max[0] >= max[1] && max[0] >= max[2]) ? max[0] : 
00064          (max[1] >= max[2]) ? max[1] : max[2];
00065 }
00066 
00067 void get_fixed_vertices( Mesh* mesh,
00068                          const Mesh::VertexHandle* verts,
00069                          size_t num_verts,
00070                          std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle>& fixed_verts,
00071                          MsqError& err )
00072 {
00073   std::vector<bool> fixed( num_verts );
00074   mesh->vertices_get_fixed_flag( verts, fixed, num_verts, err );
00075   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00076   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_verts; ++i) 
00077     if (fixed[i])
00078       fixed_verts.push_back(verts[i]);
00079 }
00080 
00081 bool non_colinear_vertices( const MsqVertex* verts,
00082                             size_t num_verts,
00083                             Vector3D coords_out[3],
00084                             double epsilon )
00085 {
00086     // This function will attempt to find trhee non-colinear 
00087     // vertices from the input list.  Further, it will attempt 
00088     // to select three such vertices that are relatively far
00089     // apart so as to minimize rounding error in any calculation
00090     // using the results of this function.
00091 
00092     // Non-colinear, by definition, must be at least trhee unique points.
00093   if (num_verts < 3)
00094     return false;
00095 
00096     // Begin with the first input vertex
00097   size_t first_idx = 0;
00098 
00099     // Choose the vertex furthest from the initial one
00100   size_t second_idx = 1;
00101   double dist_sqr = (verts[first_idx] - verts[second_idx]).length_squared();
00102   for (size_t i = 2; i < num_verts; ++i) {
00103     double ds = (verts[second_idx] - verts[i]).length_squared();
00104     if (ds > dist_sqr) {
00105       dist_sqr = ds;
00106       second_idx = i;
00107     }
00108   }
00109     // fail if all vertices are coincident
00110   if (dist_sqr <= epsilon*epsilon) 
00111     return false;
00112   
00113     // re-select the first vertex as the one furthest from the second
00114   for (size_t i = 1; i < num_verts; ++i) {
00115     double ds = (verts[second_idx] - verts[i]).length_squared();
00116     if (ds > dist_sqr) {
00117       dist_sqr = ds;
00118       first_idx = i;
00119     }
00120   }
00121   
00122     // select the third vertex as the one furthest from the line formed
00123     // by the first two vertices
00124   Vector3D b = verts[first_idx];
00125   Vector3D m = verts[second_idx] - b;
00126   Vector3D mx = m * (1.0 / m.length_squared());
00127   dist_sqr = -1.0;
00128   size_t third_idx = 0;
00129   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_verts; ++i) {
00130     double t = mx % (verts[i] - b);
00131     double ds = ((b + t*m) - verts[i]).length_squared();
00132     if (ds > dist_sqr) {
00133       third_idx = i;
00134       dist_sqr = ds;
00135     }
00136   }
00137     // fail if all vertices are colinear
00138   if (dist_sqr <= epsilon*epsilon) 
00139     return false;
00140   
00141   coords_out[0] = verts[first_idx];
00142   coords_out[1] = verts[second_idx];
00143   coords_out[2] = verts[third_idx];
00144   return true;
00145 }
00146     
00147 
00148 bool non_coplanar_vertices( const MsqVertex* verts,
00149                             size_t num_verts,
00150                             Vector3D coords_out[4],
00151                             double epsilon )
00152 {
00153     // This function will attempt to find four non-coplanar 
00154     // vertices from the input list.  Further, it will attempt 
00155     // to select four such vertices that are relatively far
00156     // apart so as to minimize rounding error in any calculation
00157     // using the results of this function.
00158 
00159     // Non-coplanar, by definition, must be at least four unique points.
00160   if (num_verts < 4)
00161     return false;
00162 
00163     // Get three non-colinear vertices
00164   if (!non_colinear_vertices( verts, num_verts, coords_out, epsilon ))
00165     return false;
00166 
00167     // The plane of the first three vertices:
00168   Vector3D norm = (coords_out[1] - coords_out[0]) * (coords_out[2] - coords_out[0]);
00169   norm /= norm.length();
00170   double d = -(norm % coords_out[0]);
00171   
00172     // Search for the fourth vertex that is furthest from the plane
00173     // of the first three
00174   double dist = -1.0;
00175   for (size_t i = 0; i < num_verts; ++i) {
00176     double disti = fabs( norm % verts[i] + d );
00177     if (disti > dist) {
00178       dist = disti;
00179       coords_out[3] = verts[i];
00180     }
00181   }
00182 
00183     // fail if all vertices are colinear
00184   return (dist > epsilon);
00185 }
